name: Audrey - Ceccotti Collezioni
description: Audrey is a collection comprising bedside lamps, desk lamps, table lamps and floor standing fixtures. The simple linear structure consists of a metal shaft supporting a lampshade in pleated fabric and white frosted glass, reminiscent of a hat worn by British actress Audrey Hepburn. The lampshade ribbon is in tone-on-tone velvet with a mother-of-pearl button.
